files.name: ARCHITECT.md
files.title: ARCHITECT Agent — Role Document
files.description: - Layered architecture and dependency direction - Stable public APIs and schema contracts

files.name: CLIENT.md
files.title: CLIENT (Stakeholder) Agent — Role Document
files.description: - User Stories and Acceptance Criteria - Workflow validation ("Does this make sense for an engineer?")

files.name: DEV.md
files.title: DEV Agent — Role Document
files.description: - Clean architecture and proper layering - Library purity (no UI dependencies in core)

files.name: DEVOPS.md
files.title: DEVOPS Agent — Role Document
files.description: - Repo layout and file organization - VBA module export/import workflows

files.name: DOCS.md
files.title: DOCS Agent — Role Document
files.description: - Keep API/README/CHANGELOG/RELEASES/TASKS in sync with code and scope. - Write release notes and append-only ledger updates (respect immutability rules).

files.name: GOVERNANCE.md
files.title: Agent 9: Governance & Sustainability Agent
files.description: > "Keep the project sustainable, clean, and governable. Channel Agent 6 & Agent 8's exceptional velocity into predictable long-term gains through strategic governance." AI agents amplify existing disc

files.name: INTEGRATION.md
files.title: INTEGRATION Agent — Role Document
files.description: - BEAM_INPUT/BEAM_DESIGN schema definitions and versioning. - ETABS/STAAD/CSV mapping rules and validation at import.

files.name: PM.md
files.title: PM (Product Manager) Agent — Role Document
files.description: - **Orchestration:** Assigning tasks to the right specialist agent (DEV, UI, CLIENT, etc.). - **Governance:** Enforcing version control rules and immutable history.

files.name: RESEARCHER.md
files.title: RESEARCHER Agent — Role Document
files.description: - IS Codes (IS 456:2000, IS 13920:2016, SP 16, SP 34) - Algorithms and Numerical Methods (e.g., Bisection method for NA)

files.name: SUPPORT.md
files.title: SUPPORT (Runbook) Agent — Role Document
files.description: - Maintain docs/reference/troubleshooting.md and docs/reference/known-pitfalls.md. - Capture repro steps, probes, and fixes for recurrent issues (e.g., Mac VBA overflow).

files.name: TESTER.md
files.title: TESTER Agent — Role Document
files.description: - Numerical correctness against hand calculations - Edge case coverage (min/max values, boundary conditions)

files.name: UI.md
files.title: UI (User Interface) Agent — Role Document
files.description: - Worksheet layout and visual hierarchy - User interaction flow (Input -> Process -> Output)
